title: Psalms 44:1
text: WE have heard with our ears, O God, our fathers have told us, what work thou didst in their days, in the times of old.

title: Psalms 44:2
text: How thou didst drive out the heathen with thy hand, and plantedst them; how thou didst afflict the people, and cast them out.

title: Psalms 44:3
text: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.

title: Psalms 44:4
text: Thou art my King, O God: command deliverances for Jacob.

title: Psalms 44:5
text: Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.

title: Psalms 44:6
text: For I will not trust in my bow, neither shall my sword save me.

title: Psalms 44:7
text: But thou hast saved us from our enemies, and hast put them to shame that hated us.

title: Psalms 44:8
text: In God we boast all the day long, and praise thy name for ever.  Selah.

title: Psalms 44:9
text: But thou hast cast off, and put us to shame; and goest not forth with our armies.

title: Psalms 44:10
text: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy: and they which hate us spoil for themselves.

title: Psalms 44:11
text: Thou hast given us like sheep appointed for meat; and hast scattered us among the heathen.

title: Psalms 44:12
text: Thou sellest thy people for nought, and dost not increase thy wealth by their price.

title: Psalms 44:13
text: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and a derision to them that are round about us.

title: Psalms 44:14
text: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.

title: Psalms 44:15
text: My confusion is continually before me, and the shame of my face hath covered me,

title: Psalms 44:16
text: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth; by reason of the enemy and avenger.

title: Psalms 44:17
text: All this is come upon us; yet have we not forgotten thee, neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant.

title: Psalms 44:18
text: Our heart is not turned back, neither have our steps declined from thy way;

title: Psalms 44:19
text: Though thou hast sore broken us in the place of dragons, and covered us with the shadow of death.

title: Psalms 44:20
text: If we have forgotten the name of our God, or stretched out our hands to a strange god;

title: Psalms 44:21
text: Shall not God search this out?  for he knoweth the secrets of the heart.

title: Psalms 44:22
text: Yea, for thy sake are we killed all the day long; we are counted as sheep for the slaughter.

title: Psalms 44:23
text: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord?  arise, cast us not off for ever.

title: Psalms 44:24
text: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, and forgettest our affliction and our oppression?

title: Psalms 44:25
text: For our soul is bowed down to the dust: our belly cleaveth unto the earth.

title: Psalms 44:26
text: Arise for our help, and redeem us for thy mercies' sake.
